name: shinobi
description: Shinobi is a self-hosted, web-based CCTV and NVR solution. It supports multiple camera vendors, motion detection, recording, and alerting, aimed at advanced but user-friendly video surveillance setups.

features.title: Recording Management
features.description: Schedules continuous or event-based recording with retention policies

features.title: User Permissions
features.description: Controls access to specific cameras and features with role-based accounts

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Extends functionality with community plugins for notifications and integrations

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Responsive web interface works on smartphones and tablets
